#### Land Development Services Alert:

CONTACT INFORMATION:  Monday through Thursday, 8 a.m. - 4 p.m. and Friday, 9:15 a.m. - 4 p.m. Please note that visitors may not be added to in-person queues past 3:45 p.m.

703-222-0801 TTY 711

LandDevelopmentServices@fairfaxcounty.gov

12055 Government Center Pkwy  
Fairfax, VA 22035

Bill Hicks  
Director

# LDS PLUS Support

## What Permit Do You Need for Your Project?

In PLUS, permit types are now referred to as "**record types**."

(For example, if you are building a deck, you would apply for an **Addition / Alteration** record type.)

**List of All Record Types and Project Instructions**

  


## YouTube Help Videos

  * **Browse all PLUS how-to videos on YouTube**
  * Subscribe to the PLUS YouTube channel to receive notifications of PLUS training videos when they are posted.



## Resources

## FOR MORE INFO SEE OUR FAQS

Have questions or need answers regarding permits, plans or inspections in PLUS?

Frequently Asked Questions

## **Virtual Customer Support**

  * Schedule a one-on-one, virtual appointment with LDS staff.



## **Walk-in Customer Support**

  * LDS staff are available to answer questions for walk-in customers, Monday through Thursday, 8 a.m. - 4 p.m and Friday, 9:15 a.m. - 4 p.m. Please note that visitors may not be added to in-person queues past 3:45 p.m.
  * Please check in at the lobby to be directed to the correct staff person.



## Click to view in Google Maps

Click to view in Google Maps

###  Herrity Building

12055 Government Center Parkway  
Fairfax, VA, 22035  
Link to Google Maps

## PLUS Application Portal

PLUS can be used to track current applications, make changes to these applications or to start a new application.

**Please Note:** Microsoft Edge is the supported browser for PLUS.

Launch PLUS

  


## Who do I call with questions?

  * If you have questions with **submitting an application** in PLUS, call 703-222-0801, TTY 711, or email ldsbuildingpermits@fairfaxcounty.gov.
  * If you have **technical questions** (e.g. account setup, password issues) with PLUS, call 703-324-2222, TTY 711, or email plussupport@fairfaxcounty.gov.



  * Latest Updates, Information for All Related Agencies & More on PLUS



  
Need Help? Call **703-222-0801** , **TTY 711**.

Monday through Thursday from 8 a.m. to 4 p.m. and Friday from 9:15 a.m. to 4 p.m.

  * LDS Permit Library: Access guides to navigate every record type in PLUS.
  * Letters to Industry: Subscribe for LDS announcements, notices, and tech bulletins.
  * Meet With Staff: Find a staff member to help you with the permit process.

metadata.title: LDS PLUS Support | Land Development Services
metadata.description: Fairfax County, Virginia - PLUS is the new central platform customers can access through the Fairfax County website to complete their zoning, building, permitting, or other land development processes.
metadata.keywords: PLUS, land development, planning, land use, lds, walk-in customer support, virtual customer support, training, YouTube, record type, PLUS FAQ
